about_the_game:
In this game, you'll take on the role of Lea, an ace pilot who has gone rogue. You'll not only have to deal with the threats of war but also confront inner struggles. Embark on a journey through a series of islands filled with battles and discoveries. In a time of chaos, stand firm with those who have their own beliefs and stories, uncover the conspiracies behind the war, unravel the secrets of the Philosopher's Stone, and bring peace to as many people as possible.
Are you ready to become the hero who will stop the war and bring new hope to these islands?

Game Features


Exciting Aerial Combat
Engage in thrilling side-scrolling shootouts, battling war machines powered by steam technology and unveiling the conspiracies of madmen.


Exquisite Pixel Art Style
The game boasts breathtaking visual effects, with every environment brimming with details and surprises.



Deep Narrative
Immerse yourself in an emotionally charged island continent, follow the characters' destinies, and unlock multi-layered storylines.

Character Interaction
Relationships and growth among the characters are integral to the game, and your decisions will influence their relationship outcomes.

Exploration of Achievements
Explore diverse island environments and unlock hidden story elements and missions.

Music and Sound Effects
The game's music and sound effects create a profound atmosphere, enhancing the emotional impact of the story.

short_description: In a world of miracles and challenges, where steam technology meets magic on a vast archipelago continent, you become Lea, an ace pilot. Your mission: conquer enemies, unveil conspiracies, and bring peace. Are you ready to be the hero who stops the war?
